main event: One object round, size of basketball, moving at high speed, side to side 5 feet in altitude direction observed in La Madera, New Mexico in December 1957.
interesting points: The object was detected using ground radar,The observation lasted for 2 to 3 minutes,The object was moving at a high speed laterally,The report notes limited visibility due to dusk,Although uncertain, there was a suggestion that the object could have been a balloon.
sighted object: one round object, size of basketball
witness description: Commander of the 687th ACWRON at West Mesa AFS
